body_html:
That seems like a footgun, a typical user might not expect match_filenames_once to be affected by checkpoint. A similar issue existed checkpoint affecting state of input pipelines that were affected by epochs variables, this was solved by making them local, as here

That seems like a footgun, a typical user might not expect match_filenames_once to be affected by checkpoint. A similar issue existed checkpoint affecting state of input pipelines that were affected by epochs variables, this was solved by making them local, as here
4c85a95
body:
That seems like a footgun, a typical user might not expect `match_filenames_once` to be affected by checkpoint. A similar issue existed checkpoint affecting state of input pipelines that were affected by `epochs` variables, this was solved by making them local, as here

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/4c85a95925a68fec324f70cd0d7f3d4548f97a38
